summary: Femme fatal/con artist Bridget Gregory travels to Barcelona and targets another businessman to scam him of his money while a relentless private investigator tries to track her down.
cast: Joan Severance|Con O'Neill|Beth Goddard|Dean Williamson|Rocky Taylor|Joseph Pilato|David Gilliam|Enrique Neant|Tara Shaw|Phil Harris|Perry Benson|Liz Daniels|Fison Burgess|Simon Fisher|Helena Boobleswang|Nicola Bertram|Gillian Elisa|Caroline Trowbridge|Dave Atkins|Enriqueta Ferré|Lluís Paracerisas|Emyr Penlan|Nicholas Caunter|Terry Arnold|Lloyd Carlston|Joan Cussó|Simon Gregor|Eugene Rene Grilfydd|Jorge Blerros Silva|Alex Brendemühl|Carlos Heredia|Owain Hopkins
title: The Last Seduction II
